name: Successfully add a new time slot for a doctor
scenarioId: schedule_availability:Successfully add a new time slot for a doctor
methodName: Successfully add a new time slot for a doctor

testSteps.description: 1: Successfully add a new time slot for a doctor ({user=carlos.santana@example.com, password=medico1234, doctorName=Carlos Santana, startDate=2025-08-01, endDate=2025-08-01, startTime=09:00, endTime=10:00})

children.description: Given the doctor "carlos.santana@example.com" with password "medico1234" is on the schedules page
Doctor open the
Doctor opens the Login page
Doctor authenticate
Doctor enters 'carlos.santana@example.com' into campo de correo electrónico
Doctor enters 'medico1234' into campo de contraseña
Doctor clicks on botón Aceptar

When he adds a new availability for "Carlos Santana" with the following data:
| StartDate | EndDate | StartTime | EndTime |
| 2025-08-01 | 2025-08-01 | 09:00 | 10:00 |
Doctor define a new
Doctor clicks on botón agregar horario para Carlos Santana
Doctor enter date
Doctor enters '01082025' into campo fecha de inicio
Doctor enter date
Doctor enters '01082025' into campo fecha de fin
Doctor selects [Ljava.lang.String;@5621a671 in selector de hora de inicio
Doctor selects [Ljava.lang.String;@54a5496f in selector de minuto de inicio
Doctor selects [Ljava.lang.String;@7d80e1b3 in selector de hora de fin
Doctor selects [Ljava.lang.String;@53d808ea in selector de minuto de fin
Doctor clicks on botón Agregar del modal
Then the new schedule from "09:00" to "10:00" on "2025-08-01" should be visible for "Carlos Santana"
Then the schedule data$$ lambda/0x00007effe74de0e8 should be '09:00 - 10:00'
Then the schedule data$$ lambda/0x00007effe74de420 should be '2025-08-01 - 2025-08-01'

userStory.narrative:
As a Doctor or Coordinator
  I want to manage the availability schedules for doctors
  To keep the appointment system up to date

title: Successfully add a new time slot for a doctor
